item.description: strategies/CurveReaperStrategyV1.vy # vyper: 0.2.12 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Curve Reaper Strategy V1 Events # CommitOwnership owner : address, notIndexed ApplyOwnership owner : address, notIndexed Methods # transferOwnership # type: nonpayable function gas: 39101 Transfers ownership by setting new owner _futureOwner candidate Callable by owner only.
